conclusion: Need to analyze the flow direction of the liquid from points A, B, and C.
The baffles are designed to redirect the flow of liquid in specific directions.
The baffles are positioned such that they guide the liquid towards either container D or E.
The liquid from point A is directed by the baffle towards container D.
Liquid from A will flow into container D.
The liquid from point B is also directed by the baffle towards container D.
Liquid from B will flow into container D.
The liquid from point C is directed by the baffle towards container E.
Liquid from C will flow into container E.
Liquid from A and B will flow into container D. Liquid from C will flow into container E.
